vanced.changelog:
20-07-2023

Patches: 2.185.0
  [2.185.0] 


 Bug Fixes

- allocate for more than eight LithoFilter array items  
- Sync for Reddit - Disable ads: fix compatibility with latest version 
- Tiktok - Settings: bump compatibility  
- TikTok - Show seekbar: fix seekbar not always showing  
- Trakt - Unlock pro: constraint to last known working version  
- YouTube - Spoof client: show video time and chapters while using seekbar  
- YouTube - SponsorBlock: fix some segments skipping slightly too late  


 Features

- youtube: rename video-speed to playback-speed  



 
 
Integrations:   [0.113.0] 
 Bug Fixes
- Tiktok - Settings: bump compatibility  
- YouTube - Hide Shorts Components: hide sound button 
- YouTube - Spoof client: show video time and chapters while using seekbar  
- youtube/return-youtube-dislike: fix dislikes not showing in some situations  
- youtube/sponsorblock: fix some segments skipping slightly too late  
 Features
- YouTube - Hide ads: hide new type of buttoned ad 
- youtube: rename video-speed to playback-speed  
 
 
CLI:   [2.23.0] 
 Features
- rip-lib and unsigned 
 

YouTube version: 18.23.35
